price: Dediler ki: "Ey Lut! Eğer sen (bu işe) son vermezsen muhakkak ki (buradan) çıkarılanlardan olacaksın."
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
